programmes.show_name: Classic Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
programmes.show_description: A classic episode of the award-winning quiz show presented by Chris Tarrant in which contestants can win up to one million pounds.
Bradley Walsh hosts the game show that asks contestants to complete a series of general knowledge questions faster than The Chaser. (S7, ep 85)
Bradley Walsh hosts the game show that asks contestants to complete a series of general knowledge questions faster than The Chaser, a brainbox of the highest order. (S9, ep 100)

Antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson travels the country, team in tow, hoping to snap up some good deals. But will the locals take the cash for their antiques or gamble at auction?

Simon Mayo hosts as contestants make their way across the iconic Blockbusters board connecting top to bottom or side to side. Who will make it to the Gold Run?

Warwick Davis hosts the game show where 10 is the magic number as contestants put their general knowledge to the test for a £125,000 jackpot prize. (S4, ep 51)
Lily Savage hosts the game show in which contestants attempt to match the answers of as many of the six celebrity panellists as possible.
